page.title: 19FORENSIC LABORATORY
page.content: From the moment a crime is detected the search is on.In many cases,such as murder,arson and burglary,there are a multitude of clues-if you know where to look for them.That is why the police are increasingly turning to science for some of the answers,and the{Home Office Forensic Science {Service}has a particularly vital contribution to make in the fight against crime.Using the latest analytical techniques it is the job of forensic scientists in the regional laboratories to uncover the facts from subtle but often decisive evidence and then to present their findings in court. Huntingdon has one of the largest and best equipped Forensic laboratories in the whole of Europe.
